trends: There has been one other sighting in Sudbury
There were no other sightings in Sudbury on or around July 11th 2008
Summary: A blimp/disc/circle object appeared in the sky miles and miles high above me
Object Shape: Blimp, Circle, Cylinder, Disc, Oval, Sphere
divs: sighting detailsi was in sudbury ma with 2 friends on a nice back road sitting on a bench on a small lake. we were hanging out talking smoking a few cigars. being as curious as i am i looked up at the sky for a while it was a clear day with only a few clouds in the sky. i was looking up towards my top left and i saw an object what appeared to be a blimp\disc like thing coming out over the trees. the object was white with big black holes all across the white it looked as if the black holes were spinning or as if the whole object was spnning. the object quicly jetted to the right and reapeared about what looked like a mile or 2 across the sky and then did it again to the right and then agian to where i first saw it. it did this for about 30-35 minutes and i could clearly tell it was not a plane bird or anything eles. i have no reason to come on here and lie about waht i saw. my father works for mufon and i am convinced what i saw was a ufo>.
